00019     : QScrollView(parent,name)

00114 BalanceSheetEditor::~BalanceSheetEditor()
00115 {
00116     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < assets.elements.size(); i++)
00117         delete assets.elements[i];
00118     assets.elements.clear();
00119     
00120     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < liabilities.elements.size(); i++)
00121         delete liabilities.elements[i];
00122     liabilities.elements.clear();
00123     
00124     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < equities.elements.size(); i++)
00125         delete equities.elements[i];
00126     equities.elements.clear();
00127 }
00128 
00129 void BalanceSheetEditor::listSection(ElementSection *section)
00130 {
00131     QPtrList<EditorElement> list;
00132     if(section == &assets)
00133         list = db->getElements(Database::balanceAssets);
00134     if(section == &liabilities)
00135         list = db->getElements(Database::balanceLiabilities);
00136     if(section == &equities)
00137         list = db->getElements(Database::balanceEquities);
00138     
00139     if(!list.isEmpty())
00140     {
00141         section->listView = new QFrame(section->bottomFrame);
00142         section->vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(section->listView);
00143         
00144         EditorElement *element;
00145         
00146         for(element = list.first(); element; element = list.next())
00147         {
00148             connect(element, SIGNAL(changed(void*)), this, SLOT(updateSection(void*)));
00149             section->elements.push_back(element);
00150             section->vBoxLayout->addWidget(element->getFrame(section->listView, (void*)section));
00151         }
00152     }
00153     else
00154         section->listView = new QLabel("No Entries", section->bottomFrame);
00155     
00156 }
00157 
00158 void BalanceSheetEditor::deleteSection(ElementSection *section)
00159 {
00160     if(section->elements.size())
00161     {
00162         for(unsigned int i = 0; i < section->elements.size(); i++)
00163             delete section->elements[i];
00164         section->elements.clear();
00165         delete section->vBoxLayout;
00166     }
00167     delete section->listView;
00168 }
00169 
00170 void BalanceSheetEditor::updateSection(void *newSection)
00171 {
00172     ElementSection *section = (ElementSection*)newSection;
00173     deleteSection(section);
00174     listSection(section);
00175     
00176     if(section == &assets) 
00177     {
00178         assets.bottomHBoxLayout->addWidget(assets.listView);
00179         assets.listView->show();
00180     }
00181     if(section == &liabilities) 
00182     {
00183         liabilities.bottomHBoxLayout->addWidget(liabilities.listView);
00184         liabilities.listView->show();
00185     }
00186     if(section == &equities) 
00187     {
00188         equities.bottomHBoxLayout->addWidget(equities.listView);
00189         equities.listView->show();
00190     }
00191 }

00193 void BalanceSheetEditor::addElement(int category)
00194 {
00195     dialog.main = new QDialog;
00196     switch((Database::editorCategories)category)
00197     {
00198         case Database::balanceAssets:
00199             dialog.main->setCaption("Add to Assets");
00200             break;
00201         case Database::balanceLiabilities:
00202             dialog.main->setCaption("Add to Liabilities");
00203             break;
00204         case Database::balanceEquities:
00205             dialog.main->setCaption("Add to Equities");
00206             break;
00207         default:
00208             break;
00209     }
00210     
00211     dialog.vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(dialog.main);
00212     dialog.vBoxLayout->setMargin(5);
00213     dialog.vBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00214     
00215     dialog.oneAccount = new QRadioButton("One Account", dialog.main);
00216     connect(dialog.oneAccount, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(oneAccountToggled()));
00217         
00218     dialog.oneAccountFrame = new QFrame(dialog.main);
00219     dialog.oneAccountHBoxLayout = new QHBoxLayout(dialog.oneAccountFrame);
00220     dialog.oneAccountHBoxLayout->setSpacing(5);
00221     
00222     dialog.oneAccountHBoxLayout->addSpacing(5);
00223     dialog.oneAccountLabel = new QLabel("Account:", dialog.oneAccountFrame);
00224     dialog.oneAccountHBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.oneAccountLabel);
00225     dialog.oneAccountEdit = new AccountList(dialog.oneAccountFrame, 0, accounts);
00226     dialog.oneAccountHBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.oneAccountEdit);
00227     dialog.oneAccountHBoxLayout->addStretch();
00228        
00229     dialog.rangeAccount = new QRadioButton("Range of Accounts", dialog.main);
00230     connect(dialog.rangeAccount, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(rangeAccountToggled()));
00231        
00232     dialog.rangeAccountFrame = new QFrame(dialog.main, "rangeAccountFrame");
00233     dialog.rangeAccountHBoxLayout = new QHBoxLayout(dialog.rangeAccountFrame);
00234     dialog.rangeAccountHBoxLayout->addSpacing(5);

00274     dialog.ok = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/addElement.png")),
00275             "Add", dialog.buttonFrame);
00276     connect(dialog.ok, SIGNAL(clicked()), dialog.main, SLOT(accept()));
00277     dialog.buttonFrameHBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.ok);
00278     
00279     dialog.cancel = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")),
00280             "Cancel", dialog.buttonFrame);
00281     connect(dialog.cancel, SIGNAL(clicked()), dialog.main, SLOT(reject()));
00282     dialog.buttonFrameHBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.cancel);
00283     
00284     
00285     dialog.vBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.oneAccount);
00286     dialog.vBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.oneAccountFrame);
00287     dialog.vBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.rangeAccount);
00288     dialog.vBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.rangeAccountFrame);
00289     dialog.vBoxLayout->addSpacing(10);
00290     dialog.vBoxLayout->addWidget(dialog.buttonFrame);
00291     
00292     oneAccountToggled();
00293     
00294     if(dialog.main->exec())
00295     {
00296         if(dialog.oneAccount->isChecked())
00297             db->createElement((Database::editorCategories)category,
00298                                       "0", "", dialog.oneAccountEdit->accountNumber(), "");
00299         else
00300             db->createElement((Database::editorCategories)category,
00301                                       "1", dialog.rangeDescEdit->text(),
00302                                       dialog.rangeBeginEdit->accountNumber(), dialog.rangeEndEdit->accountNumber());
00303     }
00304     
00305     delete dialog.main;
00306 }

00308 void BalanceSheetEditor::oneAccountToggled()
00309 {
00310     dialog.oneAccount->setChecked(true);
00311     dialog.rangeAccount->setChecked(false);
00312     dialog.oneAccountLabel->setEnabled(true);
00313     dialog.oneAccountEdit->setEnabled(true);
00314     dialog.rangeBegin->setEnabled(false);
00315     dialog.rangeBeginEdit->setEnabled(false);
00316     dialog.rangeBetween->setEnabled(false);
00317     dialog.rangeEndEdit->setEnabled(false);
00318     dialog.rangeDesc->setEnabled(false);
00319     dialog.rangeDescEdit->setEnabled(false);
00320 }
00321 
00322 void BalanceSheetEditor::rangeAccountToggled()
00323 {
00324     dialog.rangeAccount->setChecked(true);
00325     dialog.oneAccount->setChecked(false);
00326     dialog.oneAccountLabel->setEnabled(false);
00327     dialog.oneAccountEdit->setEnabled(false);
00328     dialog.rangeBegin->setEnabled(true);
00329     dialog.rangeBeginEdit->setEnabled(true);
00330     dialog.rangeBetween->setEnabled(true);
00331     dialog.rangeEndEdit->setEnabled(true);
00332     dialog.rangeDesc->setEnabled(true);
00333     dialog.rangeDescEdit->setEnabled(true);
00334 }

00336 void BalanceSheetEditor::addAssets()

00338     addElement((int)Database::balanceAssets);
00339     updateSection(&assets);
00340 }
